snippet: This new approach, if carried out with care, could be a big step forward in curbing the toll from infection.
abstract: Editorial assesses risks and benefits of drug known as Truvada, which federal health officials are urging people at high risk of contracting AIDS to take every day to protect themselves from HIV; contends benefits outweigh the risks of the drug, and the new approach could be a big step forward in curbing toll from AIDS.
lead_paragraph: This new approach, if carried out with care, could be a big step forward in curbing the toll from infection.

headline.main: A Once-a-Day Pill to Prevent AIDS
headline.print_headline: A Once-a-Day Pill to Prevent AIDS
